graphpack.taskprocessing
Interface ITaskManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskManager
public interface ITaskManager

an interface for the principle class that is responsible for task management

Author:
amitport

Method Detail

addTask

void addTask(java.lang.String clientName,
             java.lang.String nodeName,
             java.lang.String taskName,
             INode node,
             Extensions extensions,
             java.lang.Class<? extends ITask> task)
install a new task

Parameters:
clientName - the name of the client that own the task
nodeName - the name of the associated node
taskName - the name of the task
node - the actual node
extensions - possible extensions
task - the task

addScheduledTask

void addScheduledTask(java.lang.String clientName,
                      java.lang.String nodeName,
                      java.lang.String taskName,
                      INode node,
                      Extensions extensions,
                      java.lang.Class<? extends ITask> task,
                      java.lang.String cronExpression)
add a scheduled task

Parameters:
clientName - the name of the client that own the task
nodeName - the name of the associated node
taskName - the name of the task
node - the actual node
extensions - possible extensions
task - the task
cronExpression - an expression that described the task schedule, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron#CRON_expression

callTask

void callTask(java.lang.String clientName,
              java.lang.String nodeName,
              java.lang.String taskName,
              java.lang.Object... params)
execute an installed task

Parameters:
clientName - the name of the client that own the task
nodeName - the name of the associated node
taskName - the name of the task
params - parameters for the called task
